original_text:
“Because you rejoice and are glad,
    you who pillage my inheritance,
because you frolic like a heifer threshing grain
    and neigh like stallions,
korean_text: 나의 소유를 노략하는 자여 너희가 즐거워하며 기뻐하고 타작하는 송아지 같이 발굽을 구르며 군마 같이 우는도다

sentences.original_text: Because you rejoice and are glad
because you frolic like a heifer threshing grain
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 곡식을 밟는 송아지처럼 뛰놀기 때문이며
